projectPurpose: To enable developers to write, build, and deploy Cloudflare Workers using the Rust programming language and WebAssembly.
mainFeatures: Compiles to WebAssembly for execution on Cloudflare's edge
Provides Rust bindings for Cloudflare Workers APIs
Offers an alternative to JavaScript/TypeScript development for Cloudflare Workers

alternatives.name: Cloudflare Workers (JavaScript/TypeScript)
mainFeatures: Native development environment for Cloudflare Workers

alternatives.name: Fastly Compute@Edge
mainFeatures: Runs WebAssembly modules at the edge
Supports multiple languages including Rust, C, C++, AssemblyScript

alternatives.name: Vercel Edge Functions
mainFeatures: Serverless functions integrated with Vercel platform

alternatives.name: AWS Lambda@Edge
mainFeatures: Runs Lambda functions at CloudFront edge locations

marketPositioning: workers-rs is positioned as a powerful alternative development experience *within* the Cloudflare Workers ecosystem, specifically targeting developers who prefer or require the performance, safety, and tooling provided by the Rust programming language for building edge applications. It leverages WebAssembly to enable Rust execution on the Cloudflare Workers runtime, differentiating itself from the default JavaScript/TypeScript approach and competing edge platforms by offering first-party, idiomatic Rust support for Cloudflare's edge infrastructure.
